title: PVP.net Patcher kernel has stopped working
body:
So , no clue about what to do , everything worked fine till i uninstalled the game because i had some problems with the patch.
since i reinstalled the game i cant open it , everytime the message PVP.net Patcher Kernel has stopped working popps up.

replies.body: This error is usually a result of an OS setting or permissions issue blocking the patcher from loading properly.  Run through our [Permissions](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) guide for a series of  steps to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any issues afterwards!

Nothing works , ive updated my windows 7 to windows 7 service pack 1 , uninstalled the game and reinstalled like 40 times , disabled uac.
updated drivers , tried to start as administrator , nothing works.
Holy cow.

Thanks for the update!  I'd like to try one more thing before we go further.  Download our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs)  and you'll find an option to automatically configure your firewall settings.  Run this step, and let me know your results!

my friend having the same problem, since the patch.
tried reinstalling, running as admin, changing compatibility, turning firewall or windows defender off, "force a re-patch" (how would that help if you can't even open the launcher tho)...
Anything else we should try?
Im getting the same problem, i put in a ticket to the support but no answer yet.{{item:3070}}

Check out my reply to Dream Melody here!  Our [permissions ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions)guide should restore access for the patcher and get you squared away!
none of these solutions worked for me
What have you done that fixed it for ya , i tried everything nothin works.
